00003 static void PeakCorrection(CAEN_DGTZ_X742_GROUP_t *dataout) {
00004         int offset;
00005         int chaux_en;
00006         unsigned int i;
00007         int j;
00008 
00009         chaux_en = (dataout->ChSize[8] == 0)? 0:1;
00010         for(j=0; j<(8+chaux_en); j++){
00011                 dataout->DataChannel[j][0] = dataout->DataChannel[j][1];
00012         }
00013         for(i=1; i<dataout->ChSize[0]; i++){
00014                 offset=0;
00015                 for(j=0; j<8; j++){
00016                         if (i==1){
00017                                 if ((dataout->DataChannel[j][2]- dataout->DataChannel[j][1])>30){                                                                 
00018                                         offset++;
00019                                 }
00020                                 else {
00021                                         if (((dataout->DataChannel[j][3]- dataout->DataChannel[j][1])>30)&&((dataout->DataChannel[j][3]- dataout->DataChannel[j][2])>30)){                                                                
00022                                                 offset++;
00023                                         }
00024                                 }
00025                         }
00026                         else{
00027                                 if ((i==dataout->ChSize[j]-1)&&((dataout->DataChannel[j][dataout->ChSize[j]-2]- dataout->DataChannel[j][dataout->ChSize[j]-1])>30)){  
00028                                         offset++;                                                                                                                                               
00029                                 }
00030                                 else{
00031                                         if ((dataout->DataChannel[j][i-1]- dataout->DataChannel[j][i])>30){ 
00032                                                 if ((dataout->DataChannel[j][i+1]- dataout->DataChannel[j][i])>30)
00033                                                         offset++;
00034                                                 else {
00035                                                         if ((i==dataout->ChSize[j]-2)||((dataout->DataChannel[j][i+2]-dataout->DataChannel[j][i])>30))
00036                                                                 offset++;
00037                                                 }                                                               
00038                                         }
00039                                 }
00040                         }
00041                 }                                                               
00042 
00043                 if (offset==8){
00044                         for(j=0; j<(8+chaux_en); j++){
00045                                 if (i==1){
00046                                         if ((dataout->DataChannel[j][2]- dataout->DataChannel[j][1])>30) {
00047                                                 dataout->DataChannel[j][0]=dataout->DataChannel[j][2];
00048                                                 dataout->DataChannel[j][1]=dataout->DataChannel[j][2];
00049                                         }
00050                                         else{
00051                                                 dataout->DataChannel[j][0]=dataout->DataChannel[j][3];
00052                                                 dataout->DataChannel[j][1]=dataout->DataChannel[j][3];
00053                                                 dataout->DataChannel[j][2]=dataout->DataChannel[j][3];
00054                                         }
00055                                 }
00056                                 else{
00057                                         if (i==dataout->ChSize[j]-1){
00058                                                 dataout->DataChannel[j][dataout->ChSize[j]-1]=dataout->DataChannel[j][dataout->ChSize[j]-2];
00059                                         }
00060                                         else{
00061                                                 if ((dataout->DataChannel[j][i+1]- dataout->DataChannel[j][i])>30)
00062                                                         dataout->DataChannel[j][i]=((dataout->DataChannel[j][i+1]+dataout->DataChannel[j][i-1])/2);
00063                                                 else {
00064                                                         if (i==dataout->ChSize[j]-2){
00065                                                                 dataout->DataChannel[j][dataout->ChSize[j]-2]=dataout->DataChannel[j][dataout->ChSize[j]-3];
00066                                                                 dataout->DataChannel[j][dataout->ChSize[j]-1]=dataout->DataChannel[j][dataout->ChSize[j]-3];
00067                                                         }
00068                                                         else {
00069                                                                 dataout->DataChannel[j][i]=((dataout->DataChannel[j][i+2]+dataout->DataChannel[j][i-1])/2);
00070                                                                 dataout->DataChannel[j][i+1]=( (dataout->DataChannel[j][i+2]+dataout->DataChannel[j][i-1])/2);
00071                                                         }
00072                                                 }
00073                                         }
00074                                 }
00075                         }
00076                 }                                                               
00077         }
00078 }

00080 static int read_flash_page(int handle, uint8_t gr, int8_t* page, uint32_t pagenum) { 
00081   uint32_t flash_addr;
00082   uint16_t      dd;
00083   uint32_t i,tmp[528];
00084   uint32_t fl_a[528];
00085   uint8_t addr0,addr1,addr2;
00086   int ret;
00087   CAENComm_ErrorCode err[528];
00088   
00089           flash_addr = pagenum<<9;
00090           addr0 = (uint8_t)flash_addr;
00091           addr1 = (uint8_t)(flash_addr>>8);
00092           addr2 = (uint8_t)(flash_addr>>16);
00093 
00094           dd=0xffff;
00095           while ((dd>>2)& 0x1) 
00096                 if ((ret = CAENComm_Read16(handle, STATUS(gr), &dd)) != CAENComm_Success) return -1;
00097           // enable flash (NCS = 0)
00098           if ((ret = CAENComm_Write16(handle, SEL_FLASH(gr), (int16_t)1)) != CAENComm_Success) return -1;
00099           // write opcode
00100            if ((ret = CAENComm_Write16(handle, FLASH(gr), (int16_t)MAIN_MEM_PAGE_READ)) != CAENComm_Success) return -1;
00101           // write address
00102           dd=0xffff;
00103           if ((ret = CAENComm_Write16(handle, FLASH(gr), (int16_t)addr2)) != CAENComm_Success) return -1;
00104           dd=0xffff;
00105           if ((ret = CAENComm_Write16(handle, FLASH(gr), (int16_t)addr1)) != CAENComm_Success) return -1;
00106           dd=0xffff;
00107           if ((ret = CAENComm_Write16(handle, FLASH(gr), (int16_t)addr0)) != CAENComm_Success) return -1;
00108           // additional don't care bytes
00109           for (i=0; i<4; i++) {
00110                 dd=0xffff;
00111           if ((ret = CAENComm_Write16(handle, FLASH(gr), (int16_t)0)) != CAENComm_Success) return -1;
00112           }
00113           for (i=0; i<528; i+=2) {
00114                  fl_a[i] = FLASH(gr);
00115                  fl_a[i+1] = STATUS(gr);
00116           }       
00117           if ((ret = CAENComm_MultiRead32(handle,fl_a,528,tmp,err)) != CAENComm_Success) 
00118                 return -1;
00119           for (i=0; i<528; i+=2) page[(int)(i/2)] = (int8_t) tmp[i];
00120           // disable flash (NCS = 1)
00121           if ((ret = CAENComm_Write16(handle, SEL_FLASH(gr), (int16_t)0))  != CAENComm_Success) 
00122           return -1;  
00123         return 0;
00124 }

00126 int32_t LoadCorrectionTables(int handle, DataCorrection_t *Table, uint8_t group, uint32_t frequency) {
00127         uint32_t pagenum = 0,i,n,j,start;
00128         int8_t TempCell[264]; // 
00129         int8_t *p;
00130         int ret;
00131         int8_t tmp[0x1000]; // 256byte * 16 pagine
00132         for (n=0;n<MAX_X742_CHANNELS+1;n++) {
00133                 pagenum = 0;
00134                 pagenum = (group %2) ? 0xC00: 0x800;
00135                 pagenum |= frequency << 8;
00136                 pagenum |= n << 2;
00137                 // load the Offset Cell Correction
00138                 p = TempCell;
00139                 start = 0;
00140                 for (i=0;i<4;i++) {
00141                         int endidx = 256;
00142                         if ((ret =read_flash_page(handle,group,p,pagenum)) != 0) 
00143                                 return ret;
00144                         // peak correction
00145                         for (j=start;j<(start+256);j++) {
00146                                 if (p[j-start] != 0x7f) {
00147                                         Table->cell[n][j] = p[j-start];
00148                                 }
00149                                 else {
00150                                         short cel = (short)((((unsigned char)(p[endidx+1])) << 0x08) |((unsigned char) p[endidx]));
00151                                         if (cel == 0) Table->cell[n][j] = p[j-start]; else Table->cell[n][j] = cel;
00152                                         endidx+=2;
00153                                         if (endidx > 263) endidx = 256;
00154                                 }
00155                         }
00156                         start +=256;
00157                         pagenum++;
00158                 }
00159                 start = 0;
00160                 // load the Offset Num Samples Correction
00161                 p = TempCell;
00162                 pagenum &= 0xF00;
00163                 pagenum |= 0x40;
00164                 pagenum |= n << 2;
00165                 
00166                 for (i=0;i<4;i++) {
00167                         if ((ret =read_flash_page(handle,group,p,pagenum)) != 0) 
00168                                 return ret;
00169                         for (j=start;j<start+256;j++) Table->nsample[n][j] = p[j-start];
00170                         start +=256;
00171                         pagenum++;
00172                 }
00173                 if (n == MAX_X742_CHANNELS) {
00174                         // load the Time Correction
00175                         p = TempCell;
00176                         pagenum &= 0xF00;
00177                         pagenum |= 0xA0;
00178                         start = 0;
00179                         for (i=0;i<16;i++) {
00180                                 if ((ret =read_flash_page(handle,group,p,pagenum)) != 0) 
00181                                         return ret;
00182                                 for (j=start;j<start+256;j++) tmp[j] = p[j-start];
00183                                 start +=256;
00184                                 pagenum++;
00185                         }
00186                         for (i=0;i<1024;i++) {
00187                                 p = (int8_t *) &(Table->time[i]);
00188                                 p[0] = tmp[i*4];
00189                                 p[1] = tmp[(i*4)+1];
00190                                 p[2] = tmp[(i*4)+2];
00191                                 p[3] = tmp[(i*4)+3];
00192                         }
00193                 }
00194         }
00195         return 0;
00196 }

00198 void ApplyDataCorrection(DataCorrection_t* CTable, CAEN_DGTZ_DRS4Frequency_t frequency, int CorrectionLevelMask, CAEN_DGTZ_X742_GROUP_t *data) {
00199 
00200     int i, j,rpnt = 0, wpnt = 0, size1, size2,trg = 0,k;
00201     long samples;
00202     float Time[1024],t0; 
00203     float Tsamp; 
00204         float vcorr; 
00205     uint16_t st_ind=0; 
00206     uint32_t freq = frequency;
00207     float wave_tmp[1024];
00208         int cellCorrection =CorrectionLevelMask & 0x1;
00209         int nsampleCorrection = (CorrectionLevelMask & 0x2) >> 1;
00210         int timeCorrection = (CorrectionLevelMask & 0x4) >> 2;
00211    
00212         switch(frequency) {
00213                 case CAEN_DGTZ_DRS4_2_5GHz:
00214                         Tsamp =(float)((1.0/2500.0)*1000.0);
00215                         break;
00216                 case CAEN_DGTZ_DRS4_1GHz:
00217                         Tsamp =(float)((1.0/1000.0)*1000.0);
00218                         break;
00219                 default:
00220                         Tsamp =(float)((1.0/5000.0)*1000.0);
00221                         break;
00222         }
00223 
00224         if (data->ChSize[8] != 0) trg = 1;
00225         st_ind =(uint16_t)(data->StartIndexCell);
00226         for (i=0;i<MAX_X742_CHANNEL_SIZE;i++) {
00227                 size1  = data->ChSize[i];
00228 
00229                 for (j=0;j<size1;j++) {
00230                         if (cellCorrection) data->DataChannel[i][j]  -=  CTable->cell[i][((st_ind+j) % 1024)]; 
00231                         if (nsampleCorrection) data->DataChannel[i][j] -= CTable->nsample[i][j];
00232                 }
00233         }
00234         
00235         if (cellCorrection) PeakCorrection(data);
00236         if (!timeCorrection) return;
00237 
00238         t0 = CTable->time[st_ind];                       
00239         Time[0]=0.0;
00240                 
00241         for(j=1; j < 1024; j++) {
00242                  t0= CTable->time[(st_ind+j)%1024]-t0;
00243                  if  (t0 >0) 
00244                    Time[j] =  Time[j-1]+ t0;
00245                  else
00246                    Time[j] =  Time[j-1]+ t0 + (Tsamp*1024);
00247 
00248                  t0 = CTable->time[(st_ind+j)%1024];
00249         }
00250         for (j=0;j<8+trg;j++) {
00251                 data->DataChannel[j][0] = data->DataChannel[j][1];
00252                 wave_tmp[0] = data->DataChannel[j][0];
00253                 vcorr = 0.0;
00254                 k=0;
00255                 i=0;
00256 
00257                 for(i=1; i<1024; i++)  {
00258                         while ((k<1024-1) && (Time[k]<(i*Tsamp)))  k++;
00259                         vcorr =(((float)(data->DataChannel[j][k] - data->DataChannel[j][k-1])/(Time[k]-Time[k-1]))*((i*Tsamp)-Time[k-1]));
00260                         wave_tmp[i]= data->DataChannel[j][k-1] + vcorr;
00261                         k--;                                                            
00262                 }
00263                 memcpy(data->DataChannel[j],wave_tmp,1024*sizeof(float));
00264         }
00265 }
